projectList.title: Sync files between devices
projectList.description: Syncthing is a software designed to synchronize files between multiple devices including Brainy Pi. Data is synchronized between nodes using TLS. This encryption  provides  security and privacy.

projectList.title: Media Server on BrainyPi
projectList.description: Plex is a client-server setup where the client directly streams data from the Plex media server. As a result we can have all our movies, music, and photos located on this one device, the server. We will be using the Brainy Pi to achieve this.

projectList.title: System Montior on BrainyPi
projectList.description: Sysmon is a tool used to monitor system performance and manage tasks which is remotely-accessible  for servers and headless single board computer setups.

projectList.title: Retro Gaming on BrainyPi
projectList.description: EmulationStation is a frontend for emulators, which gives a graphical interface for accessing all of your games. It is a core part of RetroPie and is what lets you sort and configure games. Using EmulationStation on Brainy Pi we can start building own alternative to RetroPie.

projectList.title: BLE beacon using Eddystone
projectList.description: Eddystone is an open beacon protocol developed by Google that allows beacons to send radio signals with a webpage address (URL) to any mobile device.

projectList.title: Personal Git server on BrainyPi
projectList.description: Gogs aims to build a simple, stable and extensible self-hosted Git service that can be set up easily. This can be done with independent binary distribution across all platforms that Go supports, Linux, macOS, Windows and ARM-based systems.

projectList.title: POS on BrainyPi
projectList.description: IotPoS software is made for micro, small and medium businesses. It is

projectList.title: Store Ebooks on BrainyPi
projectList.description: COPS (Calibre OPDS (and HTML) PHP Server) software acts as a web interface on our Brainy Pi where we can access all our eBooks either through its web interface or by downloading them directly from your Brainy Pi to your devices.

projectList.title: AppleShare on BrainyPi
projectList.description: The Apple Filing Protocol is Appleâ€™s proprietary network protocol for delivering files over a network. Netatalk is a freely-available Open Source AFP fileserver. A UNIX, Linux or BSD system running Netatalk is capable of serving many Macintosh clients simultaneously as an AppleShare file server (AFP).

projectList.title: Install popular apps with one click. (Pi-Apps)
projectList.description: There is no centralized software repository, except for the apt repositories which lack many desktop applications. Pi-Apps is a well-maintained collection of app installation-scripts that you can run with one click.

projectList.title: Captive Portal on BrainyPi
projectList.description: A Captive Portal is a web page that the user of a public-access network is obliged to view and interact with before access is granted.

projectList.title: Digital Signage on Brainy Pi
projectList.description: Screenly OSE (Open Source Edition) is a digital signage software package that allows one to easily manage and display webpages, videos, images etc and make full use of Brainy Pi hardware.

projectList.title: Content Management System on BrainyPi
projectList.description: Joomla is a popular open-source content management system that allows you to publish your web content easily. It is very flexible as it helps to manage different types of web content.

projectList.title: Proxy Server on BrainyPi
projectList.description: A non-caching web proxy with advanced filtering capabilities for enhancing privacy, modifying web page data and HTTP headers, controlling access, ads and other junk. It has a flexible configuration and can be customized to your needs.

projectList.title: Personal IRC Server
projectList.description: A high-performance, light weighted internet relay chat daemon. Designed to be fast and reliable. Powering IRC networks since 1997.

projectList.title: <!-- Describe the project in 1 sentence -->
projectList.description: Icecast is an audio/video streaming media server that can be used to create everything

projectList.title: Network wide Ad-Blocker
projectList.description: The Pi-hole is a DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content without installing any client-side software.

projectList.title: Low Cost VoIP calls on BrainyPi
projectList.description: Mumble is a free, open source, low latency, VoIP, high quality voice chat application.

projectList.title: Personal Email server on Brainypi
projectList.description: We will be using Citadel software package to implement email server on Brainy Pi.It is an easy to set up, powerful yet versatile mailing server which does not require extensive configuration to get it up and running. It is 100% open source software.
